Uses of LifecycleEventInterceptor in com.oracle.tools.runtime
 

Methods in com.oracle.tools.runtime that return types with arguments of type LifecycleEventInterceptor
 Iterable<LifecycleEventInterceptor<A>> ApplicationSchema.getLifecycleInterceptors()
          Obtains the LifecycleEventInterceptors that the ApplicationSchema will attach to Applications produced by the said ApplicationSchema.
 Iterable<LifecycleEventInterceptor<A>> Application.getLifecycleInterceptors()
          Obtains the LifecycleEventInterceptors for the Application.
 Iterable<LifecycleEventInterceptor<A>> AbstractApplicationSchema.getLifecycleInterceptors()
          Obtains the LifecycleEventInterceptors that the ApplicationSchema will attach to Applications produced by the said ApplicationSchema.
 Iterable<LifecycleEventInterceptor<A>> AbstractApplication.getLifecycleInterceptors()
          Obtains the LifecycleEventInterceptors for the Application.
 

Methods in com.oracle.tools.runtime with parameters of type LifecycleEventInterceptor
 S AbstractApplicationSchema.addLifecycleInterceptor(LifecycleEventInterceptor<A> interceptor)
          Adds an LifecycleEventInterceptor to the ApplicationSchema those of which will be executed when certain LifecycleEvents occur on Applications created with the ApplicationSchema.
